docs.snippet: Spain easily outclassed Honduras but must beat Chile on Friday to ensure itself of advancing to the Round of 16.
docs.lead_paragraph: Spain easily outclassed Honduras but must beat Chile on Friday to ensure itself of advancing to the Round of 16.

docs.snippet: Zinédine Zidane of France and Lucas Radebe of South African were to discuss a match between France and South Africa. But that was before the volcano involving the French team erupted.

headline.seo: Mounting Controversy Leaves No Time for Feel-Good Questions

headline.print_headline: Amid Controversy, Little Time for Feel-Good Questions

docs.snippet: The amateur pantomime that is England's 2010 World Cup campaign took another theatrical turn on Monday, perhaps more entertaining in its way than the mercy flight of WAGs winging its way to South Africa in defiance of Coach Fabio Capello's ban on...
docs.lead_paragraph: The amateur pantomime that is England's 2010 World Cup campaign took another theatrical turn on Monday, perhaps more entertaining in its way than the mercy flight of WAGs winging its way to South Africa in defiance of Coach Fabio Capello's ban on wives and girlfriends. In an interview with ITV on Monday, Capello blasted John Terry for Terry's remarks over the weekend suggesting dissent in the England camp in the wake of the listless 0-0 draw with Algeria.
docs.abstract: Goal column; public strife that has engulfed England and France continues as both teams prepare to avoid elimination at World Cup (M)

headline.main: Dissent Continues as England and France Hope to Advance

docs.snippet: England, Spain, Russia, and a joint bid between the Netherlands and Belgium are the front-runners to host the 2018 World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA, soccer's world governing body, will decide in December which countries will host the tournament in 2018 and 2022.
docs.abstract: England, Spain, Russia, and a joint bid between the Netherlands and Belgium are the front-runners to host the 2018 World Cup.

headline.main: 2018 World Cup: Russia Moves Up the List

docs.snippet: Mexico are meeting Uruguay in Rustenberg, with just a draw needed to send both teams through to the next round.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay have won Group A by beating Mexico, who still qualify for the next round of the World Cup. The South Americans finish on 7 pts, while Mexico have 4 pts. As for the rest of the group, France go home, as do the South Africans, the first hosts to ever be knocked out in the group stages.
docs.abstract: Mexico are meeting Uruguay in Rustenberg, with just a draw needed to send both teams through to the next round.

headline.main: World Cup Live: Mexico vs. Uruguay

docs.snippet: Live analysis of the World Cup first-round match between France and South Africa in Group A.
docs.lead_paragraph: South Africa's run in the World Cup ended with a 2-1 victory over France in Bloemfontein on Tuesday, a somber end for the host country of the first World Cup in Africa and a humiliating exit for the French.
docs.abstract: Live analysis of the World Cup first-round match between France and South Africa in Group A.

headline.main: World Cup Live: France vs. South Africa

docs.snippet: Greece is trying to fend off goal-hungry Argentina in the Group B finale in Polokwane.
docs.lead_paragraph: Late goals from Martin Dimichelis and Martin Palermo preserved Argentina's perfect 3-0-0 record in Group B with a comfortable 2-0 win over Greece in Polokwane Tuesday night. Argentina won Group B with the maximum nine points and will face Mexico in the round of 16 on Sunday.
docs.abstract: Greece is trying to fend off goal-hungry Argentina in the Group B finale in Polokwane.

headline.main: World Cup Live: Greece vs. Argentina

docs.snippet: Two sides which have never faced each other in a World Cup do so in Durban and in varying degrees of third-match urgency.
docs.lead_paragraph: In a stirring match worthy of dredging tears from both sides by its conclusion, South Korea found its dream while Nigeria exited the World Cup with some fresh, near-miss nightmares.
docs.abstract: Two sides which have never faced each other in a World Cup do so in Durban and in varying degrees of third-match urgency.

headline.main: World Cup Live: Nigeria vs. South Korea

docs.snippet: The French and the English are attempting to deal with underachievement at the World Cup in typically different ways.
